ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Re: adding seeds through bean browser doesn't work in heritrix 3.3 snapshot
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder if we can use annotations to mark attributes that can be meaningfully changed at crawl time. The bean browser could then limit its editing options to
